emails.subject: Project deadline moved to Monday - URGENT
emails.snippet: Hi team, due to client feedback we need to move the project deadline to Monday. Please confirm your availability for weekend work.

emails.subject: 70% off Summer Collection - Ends Tonight!
emails.snippet: Don't miss out! Save up to 70% on designer summer pieces. Limited time offer ends at midnight.

emails.subject: Kids soccer practice moved to 4pm Saturday
emails.snippet: Parents, due to field maintenance, Saturday's practice is moved from 2pm to 4pm. Please confirm receipt.

emails.subject: Amazon Prime Day Preview - Up to 50% off Tech
emails.snippet: Prime Day starts tomorrow! Preview deals now including MacBooks, iPads, and smart home devices.

emails.subject: Security alert: New device login detected
emails.snippet: We detected a login from a new device. If this wasn't you, please secure your account immediately.

emails.subject: Home Depot Tool Sale - 40% off Power Tools
emails.snippet: Summer tool sale! Save 40% on DeWalt, Milwaukee, and Ryobi power tools. Perfect for home projects.

emails.subject: Birthday party invitation - Emma turns 8!
emails.snippet: You're invited to Emma's 8th birthday party this Sunday at 2pm. Pizza, cake, and pool party!

emails.subject: Q3 Performance Review Scheduled
emails.snippet: Your Q3 performance review has been scheduled for July 18th at 3pm with your manager.
